mapper.insert: insert into cm_site (id, tenant_id, name, domain, other_domain, template, mobile_template, language, default_site, creator, creator_name, create_time) values(#{id}, #{tenantId}, #{name}, #{domain}, #{otherDomain}, #{template}, #{mobile_template}, #{language}, #{defaultSite}, #{creator}, #{creatorName}, now())
mapper.select: select * from cm_site where tenant_id=#{tenantId} and id=#{id}
